actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution relating to the housing industry.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that there shall be no further reduction in Federal support for housing and no additional cuts in the authority of the Federal Housing Administration and the Government National Mortgage Association or in the rural housing and the elderly or handicapped programs.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the housing industry.
